name: DVloper Ultimate Custom Night: A Shadowed Tale
name_original: DVloper Ultimate Custom Night: A Shadowed Tale
description:
You find a mysterious crystal covered in blood and a piece of paper on the street. You decide to take it home and figure what it in tales. The paper shows some intrusions and you decide to go with it. After using the mysterious crystal covered in blood, you find yourself.. somewhere.. somewhere very, very dark. All around you is nothing but wild forest, it feels like a dream, a nightmare. Then in the distance, you see a building. You take the courage and walk to it. When you are at the front door, you hear something behind you. Granny, Grandpa, Slendrina, Slendrina's Mother and more characters are standing there. Grandpa raises his shotgun and you have one option: walk into the building...

This game is also on GameJolt

Buttery Stancakes recreated this game in 3D and it's a tap bit different, go check it out: https://gamejolt.com/games/slendrinasffafnight/708625

#fangame #horror #granny #hotelinsanity #slendrina #robothunt
